title: If riot secretly added 7000% damage increase when you buy ohmwrecker, would anyone even notice?
body:
Seriously, I don't think anyone would... 
(If riot secretly added 7000% damage increase when you buy ohmwrecker, would anyone even notice?) Also hid it's tooltip

replies.body: I know Trick2G and maybe some other people buy it to dive or BM, so if he were to do it and his viewers would see that... yeah I think it's safe to say that it would only take a few days for it to become widespread, being generous.
But then again he plays Udyr so I am not sure If the difference in damage would be visible :^))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))
It would be noticed and discovered by the community within hours at most.
Probably vandiril tbh
well now the question if it would be pbe or live.
I've never seen the item built in my 400 + games over 2 different account.

Depends on how the current mentality of the community was. If it's leaning towards the "Sftu bronze trash" side of things, it'll take weeks, but if it's leaning towards the "fuck off egotistical hardstuck d4" thoughts, then a few hours at most.

Nah facts are facts and even high elo take facts as such. Opinions on the other hand...

But yeah, I had a bronze Yorick main tell me to try out Approach Velocity and I was like why tf would you ever take that and then he told me the movement speed increase was *additive* and I was like... *doing math*... that's almost double?!

Been using it ever since.
While they'd take them as such, high tier might not notice, and most of the playerbase will probably go "lmao that's not how the game works u dum bronzie" despite being hardstuck g~~5~~4.
Approach velocity is a sleeper op rune for a handful of champs that wanna close the gap

I built it once when I was having fun way back when Heimer had stupid HP5. It was a regen bead build with Spirit Visage, Warmongs, ZZ and that. I'm sure he regened like 200 HP a second or something stupid.
I think I built it on an {{champion:12}}  once but my team flamed me for trolling, so I sold it for cloth armor and health pots. It was a good trade.
Doesn't Trick2g always get it?

I actually had a Thresh that tried his best to troll without trolling the other day - He built it. So I'd have noticed that day. 

When i say he tried his best to troll without trolling... He started Doran's ring.  Then built Doran's shield.. Then a Doran's blade I think? And boots, then Ohmwrecker... All while playing immaculately - Landing every hook, dodging attacks, doing his job.  It was really awkward to have a support playing so well yet building so badly.  Seemed like a super bored higher ELO player just trying to low-key troll and see if anyone freaks out.
Thats actually hilarious he was building a DND character had to get a ring and his sword and board to start off ;)

The best part is that he played it well enough that you actually couldn't really "Feel" him troll building.  If you pressed Tab and actually focused on it of course you knew, but it didn't show through in his gameplay for the most part.
Trick2g will notice

7000% of 0 is still 0 :P

/jk
Trick2G uses the item constantly on his 3 champs; Udyr, Nasus, Volibear.

I vote yes.

People meta-minded wouldn't find out until a complete idiot taught them it was bugged/hidden effect.
You'd see it start in low elo and slowly start to spread, then like throwing a match in a bucket of kerosene everyone would buy one.

oh as per a timeframe...  less than 2 days before everyone knew, but I think Riot would hotfix or disable it within a day.
who?!?
Once had someone ask me how to build it because they didn't know how to spell it or what item it was built from. I couldn't answer.
While I've never seen in built in my climb from level 30-105, I'd reserve judgement because it might appear in higher elos than I play at.

I once joined a funny game where 6 out of 10 people BUILT OHMWRECKER it was insane

Also some pro is going to find out then everyone would spam it, but only after the pro started to abuse it.
I used to build it on my old Tank Pyke build, disabling towers for dives with Pyke is dirty as hell

The sad thing is that they remove items that people use (Hunters Potion and such) and leave shit like Ohm untouched for patches.

Ohm would be useful on, say, an ADC or Caster build. But a tank should already have enough resistances to dive.
I stopped buying ohm wrecker when they nerfed its armor

There are like 7 people in the world that buy this item.
So someone would notice, but no one would care.
It would still probably be an awful item. :p

{{sticker:sg-janna}}

Ohmwrecker is a odd case

It was a item that was added due to a creators influence when that was a reward way back in season 1 for referrals
But unlike items like Athenes it's almost like they have intentionally left Ohm in a state where no one will touch it

So really, they can't get rid of it but it seems like they don't want to change the cheesy active
i used to rush ohm on shaco
i think you underestimate low elo. somewhere down there, someone is convinced that its the greatest item in existence.
Maybe Vandiril would, but people never buy this item. Its not even a valid choice.
